verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up first <S%H8462><s%> for us against <S%H413><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them?"
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up; behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

Then Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up with me into the territory <S%H1486><s%> allotted <S%H1486><s%> me, that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites; <S%H3669><s%> and I in turn <S%H1571><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> with you into the territory <S%H1486><s%> allotted <S%H1486><s%> you." So Simeon <S%H8095><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with him.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> into their hands; <S%H3027><s%> and they defeated <S%H5221><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> at Bezek. <S%H966><s%>
And they found <S%H4672><s%> Adoni-bezek <S%H966><s%> in Bezek and fought <S%H3898><s%> against him and they defeated <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites. <S%H6522><s%>

But Adoni-bezek fled; <S%H5127><s%> and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> him and caught <S%H270><s%> him and cut <S%H7112><s%> off <S%H7112><s%> his thumbs <S%H931><s%> and big <S%H931><s%> toes. <S%H931><s%> <S%H7272><s%>

And Adoni-bezek said, <S%H559><s%> "Seventy <S%H7657><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> with their thumbs <S%H931><s%> and their big <S%H931><s%> toes <S%H931><s%> <S%H7272><s%> cut <S%H7112><s%> off <S%H7112><s%> used to gather <S%H3950><s%> up [scraps] under <S%H8478><s%> my table; <S%H7979><s%> as I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has repaid <S%H9608><s%> me." So they brought <S%H935><s%> him to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and he died <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and captured <S%H3920><s%> it and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> and set <S%H7971><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%>

And afterward <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> living <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> and in the Negev <S%H5045><s%> and in the lowland. <S%H8219><s%>

So Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> [was] Kiriath-arba); and they struck <S%H5221><s%> Sheshai <S%H8344><s%> and Ahiman <S%H289><s%> and Talmai. <S%H8526><s%>

Then from there <S%H8033><s%> he went <S%H1980><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> [was] Kiriath-sepher).

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The one who <S%H834><s%> attacks <S%H5221><s%> Kiriath-sepher and captures <S%H3920><s%> it, I will even give <S%H5414><s%> him my daughter <S%H1323><s%> Achsah <S%H5915><s%> for a wife. <S%H802><s%>"

And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> Caleb's younger <S%H9512><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> it; so he gave <S%H5414><s%> him his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Achsah <S%H5915><s%> for a wife. <S%H802><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about when she came <S%H935><s%> [to him,] that she persuaded <S%H5496><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> her father for a field. <S%H1><s%> Then she alighted <S%H7704><s%> from her donkey, <S%H6795><s%> and Caleb <S%H2543><s%> said <S%H3612><s%> to her, "What <S%H559><s%> do you want?"

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Give <S%H3051><s%> me a blessing, <S%H1293><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you have given <S%H5414><s%> me the land <S%H776><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>" So Caleb <S%H3612><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the lower <S%H8482><s%> springs. <S%H1543><s%>

And the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of the Kenite, <S%H7017><s%> Moses' father-in-law, went <S%H5927><s%> up from the city <S%H5892><s%> of palms <S%H8558><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the south <S%H5045><s%> of Arad; <S%H6166><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> with the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> living <S%H3427><s%> in Zephath, <S%H6857><s%> and utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it. So the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with its territory <S%H1366><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> with its territory <S%H1366><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> with its territory. <S%H1366><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and they took <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country; <S%H2022><s%> but they could not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had iron <S%H1270><s%> chariots. <S%H7393><s%>

Then they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> to Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had promised; <S%H1696><s%> and he drove <S%H3423><s%> out from there <S%H8033><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak. <S%H6061><s%>

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> so the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> have lived <S%H3427><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
Likewise the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up against Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with them.
And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spied <S%H8446><s%> out Bethel <S%H1008><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was formerly <S%H6440><s%> Luz <S%H3870><s%>).

And the spies <S%H8104><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> coming <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and they said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Please <S%H4994><s%> show <S%H7200><s%> us the entrance <S%H3996><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> and we will treat <S%H6213><s%> you kindly. <S%H2617><s%>"

So he showed <S%H7200><s%> them the entrance <S%H3996><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> but they let <S%H7971><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his family <S%H4940><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> free. <S%H7971><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites <S%H2850><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> it Luz <S%H3870><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is its name <S%H8034><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

But Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> did not take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of Beth-shean and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> or Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its villages; <S%H1323><s%> so the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> persisted <S%H2974><s%> in living <S%H3427><s%> in that land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> became <S%H2388><s%> strong, <S%H2388><s%> that they put <S%H7760><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to forced <S%H4522><s%> labor, <S%H4522><s%> but they did not drive <S%H3423><s%> them out completely. <S%H3423><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Ephraim <S%H669><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who were living <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> so the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Kitron, <S%H7003><s%> or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Nahalol; <S%H5096><s%> so the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them and became <S%H1961><s%> subject to forced <S%H4522><s%> labor. <S%H4522><s%>

Asher <S%H836><s%> did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Acco, <S%H5910><s%> or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> or of Ahlab, <S%H303><s%> or of Achzib, <S%H392><s%> or of Helbah, <S%H2462><s%> or of Aphik, <S%H663><s%> or of Rehob. <S%H7340><s%>

So the Asherites <S%H843><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> for they did not drive <S%H3423><s%> them out.

Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-shemesh, or the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-anath, but lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-shemesh and Beth-anath became <S%H1961><s%> forced <S%H4522><s%> labor <S%H4522><s%> for them.

Then the Amorites <S%H567><s%> forced <S%H3905><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> for they did not allow <S%H5414><s%> them to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley; <S%H6010><s%>

yet the Amorites <S%H567><s%> persisted <S%H2974><s%> in living <S%H3427><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Heres, <S%H2776><s%> in Aijalon <S%H357><s%> and in Shaalbim; <S%H8169><s%> but when the power <S%H3027><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> grew <S%H3513><s%> strong, <S%H3513><s%> they became <S%H1961><s%> forced <S%H4522><s%> labor. <S%H4522><s%>
And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> ran from the ascent <S%H4610><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H4610><s%> from Sela <S%H5554><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>
